experience.title: Product Analyst (PPO Offered)
experience.description: Team - RM Servicing and BuildersObjective: Increase leads via new CTAs for new builder’s projects, streamline lead generation and decrease customer calls for paid plans • Elevated lead generation by 11% and generated INR 6 Cr+ monthly revenue through the strategic implementation of 2 new CTAs • Reduced inbound and outbound calls by 32% and 10% respectively through a product and communications overhaul for a premium plan • Achieved a 30% higher closure rate of referral leads for paid subscriptions by optimizing lead generation process for resale properties

experience.title: Product Management and Strategy Intern
experience.description: Objective: To facilitate Wizdom’s growth by creating a freemium business model and features for non-premium users to increase their retention•	Conceptualized two new features to increase retention & wireframed a prototype using Figma, and documented all technical requirements•	Increased time spent on the app by 23% by changing the content to be published on app based on analyzing user data and user interviews•	Reduced CAC by 9% by doing selective targeting of Wizdom’s potential in Facebook and Google ads after analyzing Google Play Store data
experience.description_html: Objective: To facilitate Wizdom’s growth by creating a freemium business model and features for non-premium users to increase their retention• Conceptualized two new features to increase retention & wireframed a prototype using Figma, and documented all technical requirements• Increased time spent on the app by 23% by changing the content to be published on app based on analyzing user data and user interviews• Reduced CAC by 9% by doing selective targeting of Wizdom’s potential in Facebook and Google ads after analyzing Google Play Store data

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: clite is a platform to help college students explore different career domains and get mentorship from their career twinIt was my first attempt at entrepreneurship, and it helped me learn various things I believe I would never have learnt any other way. •	Designed UI/UX and developed an app using Flutter and Firebase and launched it on Play Store leading to 2000+ downloads with 4.9 rating•	Generated revenue of INR 7K, via clite mentorship initiative having a gross margin of 20% and helping 23 students get mentored•	Achieved 70% adoption rate in 7 campuses and increased user base to 2000+ by launching clite Academics (a section to get notes)•	Launched blogs and podcasts on the app which helped us to reduce churn and increased retention by 24% over a month•	Hired and managed a team of 10 interns to help us expand our services to 6 more colleges leading to 4x increase in our userbase
experience.description_html: clite is a platform to help college students explore different career domains and get mentorship from their career twinIt was my first attempt at entrepreneurship, and it helped me learn various things I believe I would never have learnt any other way. • Designed UI/UX and developed an app using Flutter and Firebase and launched it on Play Store leading to 2000+ downloads with 4.9 rating• Generated revenue of INR 7K, via clite mentorship initiative having a gross margin of 20% and helping 23 students get mentored• Achieved 70% adoption rate in 7 campuses and increased user base to 2000+ by launching clite Academics (a section to get notes)• Launched blogs and podcasts on the app which helped us to reduce churn and increased retention by 24% over a month• Hired and managed a team of 10 interns to help us expand our services to 6 more colleges leading to 4x increase in our userbase

experience.title: GLOBAL REMOTE MENTORING PROGRAM
experience.description: Stockplot A platform which allows users to back-test several strategies on Indian stocks and educate users about finance via blogs•	Built an API middleware in Python and deployed it on Heroku to fetch data from Yahoo Finance to be used for the back testing of strategies•	Added functions to allow users to back test strategies using technical indicators (Bollinger Bands, RSI etc.) on Indian stocks•	Designed the UI/UX of dashboard and web app, along with user flow diagrams and wrote blogs about technical indicators
experience.description_html: Stockplot A platform which allows users to back-test several strategies on Indian stocks and educate users about finance via blogs• Built an API middleware in Python and deployed it on Heroku to fetch data from Yahoo Finance to be used for the back testing of strategies• Added functions to allow users to back test strategies using technical indicators (Bollinger Bands, RSI etc.) on Indian stocks• Designed the UI/UX of dashboard and web app, along with user flow diagrams and wrote blogs about technical indicators
